main event: Airline pilots observed an unidentified flying object while flying from Memphis, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object was reported to be circular with a diameter of approximately 40-50 feet,The object emitted three brilliant flashes of light per second,The sighting lasted for approximately 12-15 seconds while the object passed directly in front of the airliner,The object was flying at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet higher than the airline,There were no indications of the object being a known aircraft or aerial vehicle.
sighted object: unidentified circular object emitting flashes of light
